outcome_classification: Successful: The mouse retrieved most of the water (more than 70%). Justification: The mouse used its right paw to physically contact and manipulate the water drop, bringing it close to its mouth and licking it repeatedly. The water drop was fully consumed without visible spillage, and the mouse’s tongue made no contact with the drop — consistent with the head-fixed setup — yet the water was retrieved entirely via paw manipulation.
